body_html:
I never found a solution to virtualenv. I assume it had something to do with the issue I had when I installed normally without Virtualenv.

After the Virtualenv problems I went back to trying to install normally and my python wouldn't recognize TensorFlow to import. I had to uninstall protobuf before I installed TesnorFlow because it needed a specific protobuf version for TensorFlow to work.
body_text:
I never found a solution to virtualenv. I assume it had something to do with the issue I had when I installed normally without Virtualenv.
After the Virtualenv problems I went back to trying to install normally and my python wouldn't recognize TensorFlow to import.  I had to uninstall protobuf before I installed TesnorFlow because it needed a specific protobuf version for TensorFlow to work.
body:
I never found a solution to virtualenv. I assume it had something to do with the issue I had when I installed normally without Virtualenv. 

After the Virtualenv problems I went back to trying to install normally and my python wouldn't recognize TensorFlow to import.  I had to uninstall protobuf before I installed TesnorFlow because it needed a specific protobuf version for TensorFlow to work.
